item.title: 2020-04-25: Touchstone-3 Unit-9 Lesson.D
item.description: Unit-9: Tech savvy? Lesson.D: Identity theft Most People know how to stay safe in the city: Don’t walk alone after dark, hold onto your bag on crowded subways, and only ride in registered cabs. However, many people are not so savvy when it comes to staying safe on the Internet and don’t know what to look for. Identity theft - when thieves steal your personal information and use your identity to open bank or credit card accounts or take out home loans in your name -is on the rise.
